name: Sergeant Daniel Contreras
descriptions: Sgt. Daniel Contreras is an NCR supply merchant in Camp McCarran in 2281.

The head of the Camp McCarran supply shack, Contreras is about as shady as they come, without being found behind bars. Just how he managed to become the supply manager for the entire Camp McCarran is not entirely clear, but he has held that position for a while. The NCR military police is aching for an excuse to put him before a court martial, but so far he has been staying ahead of Lieutenant Carrie Boyd. Despite weekly inventory checks coming up short on guns and ammo, he holds on to his position, always pawning the goods away before the MPs come to search his possessions and quarters again.

The MPs' suspicions are ultimately valid. Contreras uses his position as a supply sergeant to steal weapons and ammunition meant for Army use and resell them on the black market to mercenaries and the like.
Beyond guns, Contreras also uses his connections to acquire chemical components that are ostensibly for medical use by the Army,
Contreras was written by area designer Robert Lee.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: You look like someone in need of a reliable supplier.

topics.topic_text: What kind of supplies did you have in mind?
topics.response_text: For you? Just the basics. Come back when you're a little more seasoned and maybe we could talk about other options.

topics.topic_text: Some other guy replaced Price, and he definitely didn't know the password.
topics.response_text: Ah shit, I'm guessing he got caught by the NCR. You need to kill that guy now that he's seen you.

topics.topic_text: Nevermind.
topics.response_text: What do you need then?

topics.topic_text: [50 caps] Maybe some caps will clarify things.
topics.response_text: Now you're talking my language. I do have an expanded inventory for people I can trust.

topics.topic_text: I can be pretty resourceful.  Perhaps we could work out a deal?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Now you're talking my language. I do have an expanded inventory for people I can trust.

topics.topic_text: I've got connections.  Maybe we could make an arrangement?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Now you're talking my language. I do have an expanded inventory for people I can trust.

topics.topic_text: You said you have some legwork needing done?
topics.response_text: Well, I can't exactly go wandering off the base whenever I want, you know? They're already suspicious.

topics.topic_text: Maybe later.
topics.response_text: All right, well just find me when you want to get started.

topics.topic_text: I'll do it.
topics.response_text: Great. Let me know what he says. They're almost a straight shot north from here, up past the sharecroppers.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Later.

topics.topic_text: Price is being held by the NCR.  A Ranger replaced him.
topics.response_text: Ah shit. Well, please tell me you didn't hand him the package.

topics.topic_text: I didn't really have a choice.
topics.response_text: Now you're just going to have to take him out. I can't afford having NCR knowing about my side business...

topics.topic_text: We don't have to kill him.  You could work with him and make caps.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] That might just work. Tell him I'll cut him in on a bit of the profit and help him track down drug dealers if he'll give me a pass.

topics.topic_text: <Hand Contreras the package> Nah, but he is definitely looking for you.
topics.response_text: Thank God. You're going to need to take him out.

topics.topic_text: Killing a Ranger brings big risks.  Killing gets expensive.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, here's a little something in advance. Now get the job done.

topics.topic_text: Here are the medical supplies from Blake.
topics.response_text: See, you're practically stealing caps from me, this work is so easy.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready for the next task.
topics.response_text: Well, I'm not. Come back tomorrow and the stuff will be ready to transport.

topics.topic_text: Remind me where Isaac is.
topics.response_text: The Gun Runners are almost straight north of here. A little east. Isaac has a house in their compound.

topics.topic_text: Right...  Well, I'll keep that in mind.
topics.response_text: Be sure you do.

topics.topic_text: Don't worry.  He won't be telling anyone anything ever again.
topics.response_text: Good to hear.

topics.topic_text: Some guy is standing in for Price.  I didn't inquire further.
topics.response_text: Huh. Not good. Price works alone. Chat him up and see what's going on.

topics.topic_text: Price wasn't there.  I fought some guy claiming to be his replacement.
topics.response_text: Well, it sounds like you screwed the pooch. Give me the package back.

topics.topic_text: The guy claiming to stand in for Price is dead.
topics.response_text: Good to hear.

topics.topic_text: All right, what's the job?
topics.response_text: Great. The Crimson Caravan has something ready for me.

topics.topic_text: Sounds simple enough. I'll get right on it.
topics.response_text: Thanks. Don't come back until you have it. Crimson Caravan is just northeast of the Gun Runners. Blake's usually in the main office.

topics.topic_text: Don't worry.  I paid him off.  He won't be a problem.
topics.response_text: You bribed a{emph}Ranger? Ha! That's gotta be some kind of special talent.

topics.topic_text: See you later.
topics.response_text: Get it done.

topics.topic_text: Got anything for sale?
topics.response_text: Take your pick.

topics.topic_text: He's looking to break up trafficking.  Maybe there is money to be made here...
topics.response_text: That might just work. Tell him I'll cut him in on a bit of the profit and help him track down drug dealers if he'll give me a pass.

topics.topic_text: No problem.  Consider it done.
topics.response_text: Don't come back until his corpse is rotting in the sunlight. The last thing I need is a do-gooder Ranger trying to take me down.

topics.topic_text: Isaac said they'll have the extra guns and ammo in the next shipment.
topics.response_text: Very professional. I like that. Maybe you can handle something bigger.

topics.topic_text: I convinced the Ranger to work with you.  You're safe, but be careful.
topics.response_text: Good to hear.

topics.topic_text: That's it? A few caps and another errand?
topics.response_text: {Sarcastic}You're right. I'm just an under-the-table arms dealer. What could I possibly offer you, a drifting mercenary? Sorry for wasting your time.

topics.topic_text: Hey, these medical supplies look like chem ingredients.
topics.response_text: Really? I never noticed that. I'm just following orders here, moving supplies as needed.

topics.topic_text: All right.  I guess I believe you.
topics.response_text: Good. Does that mean you have those supplies?

topics.topic_text: Bullshit.  If you're moving drugs, I'm going to have to report you.
topics.response_text: Whoa there, kiddo. No need to blow things out of proportion. I'm just selling certain ingredients on the side, not chems.

topics.topic_text: Isaac has me out looking for metal so they can do the first shipment.
topics.response_text: Well what the hell are you doing here? Get your ass out and find that metal.  Don't come back until the job is done!

topics.topic_text: Lying bastard.  I want cut in on this action.
topics.response_text: You're one pushy son of a bitch, I'll give you that. Alright, here are some caps to keep your mouth shut.

topics.topic_text: The law is the law.  I'm done doing business with you.
topics.response_text: Now see, that's just downright unfriendly of you. I can't just let you go shooting your mouth off to Boyd now can I?

topics.topic_text: I don't really agree with you, but I'm not interested in moving drugs for you.
topics.response_text: Fine, piss off then. I thought we had a good thing going here, but it looks like you're just a goody-goody.

topics.topic_text: Does it mean anything?
topics.response_text: Yeah. It means you don't get shot.

topics.topic_text: Blake is where, exactly?
topics.response_text: The Crimson Caravan is up north past the Gun Runners. During the day Blake is usually in their main office.

topics.topic_text: Where was I supposed to meet Price, again?
topics.response_text: Pawn shop in Westside called Miguel's. It's in outer Vegas, northwest of the Strip.

topics.topic_text: Seen anything suspicious lately?
topics.response_text: You mean other than some stranger with no military ID interrogating me inside our base?
